website_summaries.verdict: Despite its limitations, this glucometer is worth considering for anyone needing a budget-friendly option.
pros: Basic, affordable, and easy to use
Has a large screen that's easy to read
Users are happy about the reasonable price of the test strips
cons: Calibrating it can be challenging, but it must be done for accurate results

customer_reviews.title: Great, accurate meter for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: Just found out I’m prediabetic and per my doctor recommendation I need to start watching my glucose levels and diet. Great little kit with everything I needed to start for a low price. I wanted to see how accurate it was so I brought it with my to my appointment this morning to compare the results at the doctors office and they were almost exactly the same. For the price, this is a great meter!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kit at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I forgot my meter at my family's house during the Thanksgiving holiday and needed a new one right away. This kit has everything that I needed to test and is very accurate. With the price of test strips I will continue to use this meter!
customer_reviews.author: Bri Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Results matched my freestyle meter but the strips are much cheaper. I like the lancing device that comes with it. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good meter for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband - the doctor said he was pre-diabetic. This has been helpful in helping keep track of his blood sugar and keep it in check! It’s pretty easy to use and seems pretty reliable so far. For the price, it is a good deal. The instructions and UI are clear and it’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: minamesephy

customer_reviews.title: read and follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: I needed a complete, do-it-yourself, glucose meter kit. and I got it ! these lancets don't hurt as much as I thought they would...happy day ;-) and I have the highest penetration setting on # 5.. my wife always said I was thick skinned !! hhummm ?
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Joe Cool

customer_reviews.title: Works great fair price.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't come with a lot of test strips, but good simple to use device for very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Battery won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: For some unknown reason it keeps turning itself on throughout the day & night & beeps 3-4 times. I thought at first it was because it was in the case & possibility got bumped on but then I took it out of the case laying it on a flat surface & it is still doing it. At this rate I will need a new battery every month & it takes a disk style battery. Other than that it appears to be accurate & I like it. I missed the return window by a couple days, since I only realized this was happening when I moved it to my bedroom & could hear it tun on throughput the night. 😬😞
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Going Back!
customer_reviews.text: This device will not register a reading at all! I've tried several times and stuck my finger more times than should be reasonably necessary. This is going back!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ballard

customer_reviews.title: unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Very inconsistent readings compared on different fingers at the same time can range from 97-116. I have no clue what my fasting blood sugar actually is. I am going to have to find a reliable monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Roth

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have hypoglycemia and needed a new meter. I really like this one. It's easy to use and was really easy to set up. I like how it comes with the nice carrying case. I wish it came with more strips but those can easily be ordered too. I would highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great instruction books. Came in spanish and english. Very satisfied with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Shop2much

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!! Doesn't work!!! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL!!! Do not buy!!! The meter doesn't work! Then I called the support number and the guy gave me complicated set up instructions but it still didn't work even when following his instructions. Then, the plastic trigger wasn't working (it wasn't triggering). So I tried picking my finger myself but it wasn't drawing enough blood. The guy on the phone told me I has to pull harder on the trigger so I pulled harder and the plastic broke! Just awful!!!! I better get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Tired of wasting my time (and blood)
customer_reviews.text: I've wasted 1/3 of the supplies on this useless device. Both myself and my partner read the instructions thoroughly and followed them to a 'T'. Keep receiving E-5 though I'm putting a giant blob of blood on the strip. Amazon will not allow a return because it's past 30 days. Total waste of $.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Small enough to carry with you
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to test his blood.it comes with a case, small bag of needles, Test strips and oil to make sure it still works properly. I like that it has straps to keep everything in place and not flip around when taking it with you. I wish that it came with more strips and needles as mine only came with 12. It is a little hard to get the strip in the monitor. Other than that,really like how the case zips up!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you purchase extra strips. Other than that it works great
customer_reviews.author: Txrainbow68

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly after practice
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought I had a defective unit because I was dabbing a small drop of blood onto the top flat side (which is wrong). I soon realized that I had to touch the top edge of the strip to the droplet of blood and the strip the 'sucked in' the amount it needed for measurement. I hope I explained that right. It works perfectly, every time. The price is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: right out of the box I was able to use the machine with the quick reference sheet. the best part about this transaction is the price. the machine and test strips are inexpensive. really easy to use. and in 3 seconds you have your results. would recommend this glucose monitor to others.
customer_reviews.author: ila b

customer_reviews.title: Let's you know about your blood sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to check my sugar. Happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended!
customer_reviews.text: Works as I hoped! Not many strips. The lancets are super fine needles and cause hardly any pain at all when using!
customer_reviews.author: SydneyG

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Got this about a month ago and have had nothing but issues. I get an actual reading about 1 out of every 5 times. Just about every time I try to get a reading it says “error”. This isn’t my first one so I know how to use it, but it’s just not working good. Because it always messes up I constantly waste the test strips. I wish I would have gone with a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Roz

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom, she liked it. Was also very affordable
customer_reviews.author: Mackayla G.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working with an E-03 a few times, now doesn't want to even recognize strips. Changing to new battery did not work. Buying one more because I just got through ordering new strips & lances thinking that was the problem. I just hope this new one works long enough to use up the new supplies then I'll be shopping for another brnad before this new one goes out also.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Control solution did not work
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this would have been an ok product if the control solution provided worked. I followed all the instructions given on how to do a control test when setting up the meter. I tried it five times, and each of the control results fell outside of the control target range. Either the solution doesn't work, or I have a faulty product. It would be nice to have something that works, because I can't get a good reading until a good control test is done.
customer_reviews.author: M. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Great for testing blood on the keto diet.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not diabetic but I’m on the keto lifestyle change. This is very easy to use. Great price for the kit. After eating certain foods I will test my blood sugar along with my keto’s to see how that food effects my blood readings.
customer_reviews.author: Transammatt

customer_reviews.title: accurate on fingertips, not alternate sites
customer_reviews.text: only on the fingers was i able to get accurate readings. if you tested forearm or thigh you'll get wild variations. also be sure to clean your hands before using this, sweat or anything dirty will make the readings off.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Never Worked
customer_reviews.text: Got this and saw lots of instructions. I already got one of a different brand but went out of strips and during corona times they arent sending new ones. This seemed good but when I inserted strips into glucose meter it is not tightly fitting in. I thought I am wrongly inserting but after couple of tries found it is so loose and any triggering the meter is pure by luck. Ideally I wanted to return but just tired of going to post office for sending this back again during these times. Its a long time I have bought a bad product from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: cleanslate

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is impossible to use. I have tried so many times to program it but can't get it right. I am beyond frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ford

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This works well. I haven’t had experience with having to use this type of device before (I had to start measuring my blood sugar during pregnancy) so this was a little overwhelming at first - but once I got the hang of it, it works great! I also like how it fits in a small carrying case along with the needed supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Hallam

customer_reviews.title: Wildly Varies in Results
customer_reviews.text: The readings with this meter are WAY different than my old True Test meter. And with this meter, my test results can vary 50 points or more when retesting within one minute. This and 100 test strips are going to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. May

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: Do not bother with On Call products. The blood test solution on this device started reading off by 100 within a week of using this product. Its also never gotten reliable readings. You can do the same blood twice on two different strips and it will be way off on each reading.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I've had to prick my finger and waste 5 strips
customer_reviews.text: This reader only produced results once. Now it continues to read E-4 when I test...I've had to prick my finger and waste 5 strips. This is a poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole1

customer_reviews.title: Nice little device
customer_reviews.text: It was a good little meter I like it. Did not use it for long but it did the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20 year old pup and he started drinking a lot of water. The vet checked him for diabetes and he is ok. That said, I wanted to monitor him more frequently and this little kit was the perfect answer. What I paid for the kit was less than one office visit to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: not accurate
customer_reviews.text: like another customer review stated, i too had three different readings within a few minutes apart - 127, 113, 119. and here i was panicking about high sugar when all along it was feeding me a line of BS. this after i go and purchase a ton of lancets and strips which both have been opened so i believe non-returnable. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: *biglove*

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, strips are a good value. I was not a fan of the lancing tool, but otherwise this is cheaper than using my insurance.
customer_reviews.author: ky40311

customer_reviews.title: The test strips were defective
customer_reviews.text: The kit itself seems to work fine, but I was really discouraged to see that 6 out of the 10 strips were defective. My arm looks like a pincushion after so many tries to find a strip that can do an accurate reading. I would not recommend this product as a result and am considering returning it (but not sure if it's possible since it's been used).
customer_reviews.author: Judith V.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to get started monitoring your blood sugar at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get started monitoring your blood sugar at an affordable price. I would recommend this kit - and it all packs nicely in the little case.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is used by my grandmother and she has been able to use it easily. Excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and it works great. Every household need to have this on hand
customer_reviews.author: mom2jav

customer_reviews.title: Quick and simple
customer_reviews.text: I never used one of these meters before and was easily able to use this without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: wynne

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you will love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine it does hurt at all very easy to read great value test strips are cheap
customer_reviews.author: gail williams Henry

customer_reviews.title: SCAM DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Such a fake product. Ended up using 10 trips but it never measured my blood. Followed exact steps from the instructions but never worked. Pricked myself 10 times and now have weird feelings in my fingers. Please DO NOT buy this product. I don't know how Amazon sells such defective/fake products for sensitive blood sugar tests. Horrendous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Came fast. The product is of good quality but the numbers are off compared to my other system... not by a lot so I have to see which is wrong but overall good nothing negative to say
customer_reviews.author: Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Decent meter
customer_reviews.text: The meter works fine since I replaced the battery, but I'm not pleased that my meter came with a dead battery.
customer_reviews.author: Nice Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is a accurate but it works every time we use it to check my daughter's blood sugars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit. For someone who has no idea how to use these kits, this one was used friendly and came with great instructions. Everything was neatly packed in the case and ready to use. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Great test kit for diabetics
customer_reviews.text: This comes with the testing solution so you don't have to buy it separately. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Meter
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is fantastic. We've tested it against another meter multiple times and it always holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.text: Use it quite a bit. It’s pretty accurate. I check my blood sugar everyday to every two or three days. Easy to read!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me!
customer_reviews.text: There is NO WAY this meter is accurate! I tested my levels when I felt so low, I felt faint, it said I was at 99. Tested it again right away with new everything, results now at 110. Next day, I felt low again, results 85, tested a half hour later, no food or drink, results 130. NOT POSSIBLE!!! I feel like I wasted $12!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works well. Easy and quick to read.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Redd

customer_reviews.title: Does just what it says
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. Simple to set up and use. It doesn't have Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Thel

customer_reviews.title: Inoperable lancing devic e
customer_reviews.text: Unable to draw a drop of blood on any lancer setting, and had to order separate lancer to use with device.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: THis is just what we needed and is super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: mandican

customer_reviews.title: It’s so off
customer_reviews.text: So off it’s not even funny spent 10 bucks more and got a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Calli joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to follow the instructions, easy to use and quick results.
customer_reviews.author: Roxii

customer_reviews.title: Product description is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: The On Call Express monitoring system comes with 10 lancets not 30. You will need to immediately order more lancets. It is easy to use and results are easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Tricities

customer_reviews.title: Great job thanks
customer_reviews.text: Best I’ve ever seen my first on was junk compared to this one. Thanks Bob
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lavallee w9kto

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Work good right out the box with no problem use only to check that everything it's good
customer_reviews.author: Faustino carire

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and value ...works just the same as more expensive brands
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: 3 different readings done in 5 minutes:85,137,115. Not accurate,don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Need more test strips
customer_reviews.text: It only came with 10 test strips, I wish it had more
customer_reviews.author: april coles

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price!! Stripes are an awesome price too!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Huitron

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship and quality of carrying case
customer_reviews.text: I collected the testing kit on Aug 23, 2019. After using it for 22 tests, I find that the carrying case is broken. I cannot zip it shut. I think it is due to the poor workmanship and quality of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: More than what I expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: At this price point this was more than I expected to get. It works great, large screen to read, compact carrying case. I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Megan F

customer_reviews.title: Defective - batteries dead and unit did not work
customer_reviews.text: Okay I could have sent it back and then I forgot so unfortunately I am out the money I spent but this unit did not work at all
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Defective and opened kit delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Had a very bad experience. Most strips had E-4 error and some of them had extreme readings. I test showed I had hyperglycemia and other portrayed that I had diabetes. Very disappointed with performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great first kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit. I’m a fan of the lancing device.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home users
customer_reviews.text: it look correct device for blood sugar. If this broken, I will contact the customer service. This's best important thing
customer_reviews.author: Zeynep Olcal

customer_reviews.title: Not giving accurate results
customer_reviews.text: Results are not accurate..I got two different results at same time. Once it was 152 and then immediately it was 200
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: difficult set up
customer_reviews.text: completely wasted time trying to set up. different readings all 3x tested.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonitis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what I needed. It came with everything I needed to get started and perfectly packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly, super easy to use. It comes with a guide in English and Spanish. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Valdes Romero

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glucometer. I had a few questions during my first use and I called customer service, they were very helpful and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Could use more comprehensive directions
customer_reviews.text: As I’ve never used this product before, I could’ve used more clear directions. Didn’t realize the test strips are in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Olyrox

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This glucose tester is easy to use and doesn't take a whole lot of blood to get it to register.
customer_reviews.author: lp

customer_reviews.title: Accurate product
customer_reviews.text: This worked just as easy as it said it would. Also a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Product Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use this device and is very confusing. Could be operator error. I read the instructions several times. Very confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste ur money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste ur money buying it. The results are not accurate. Really bad. 100% Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GABI OP

customer_reviews.title: Lancing device not working
customer_reviews.text: The lancing device does not work on the item i received, the depth is totally off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Does not last!
customer_reviews.text: The battery was leaking, didn’t work , but few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Verona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great glucose meter! If you want a simple and accurate meter to use. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R83

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poorly calibrated, gives readings over 25-50 mg/dl sugar levels W514
customer_reviews.author: William Padamadan

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I have used devices like this in the past that cost much more so I didn't expect much at the price point. However I was surprised that this worked as good as any I have had in the past. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have only been able to get one reading out of this machine. All tests resulted in different errors. The machine randomly comes on and I only notice it because the constant beeping. Wish I could return or exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Ngozi

customer_reviews.title: Ok for unimportant testing or practice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little kit however, the lancet tool does not work. I just take the individual lancets and poke which works fine but kind of silly since it’s supposed to have a specific tool for it. The readings seem accurate and it’s nice that there’s a memory option. I don’t have diabetes though and probably wouldn’t recommend this as a daily tester for someone who does. I’m just checking for swings of low blood sugar, it’s not amazing quality for someone to use for actual testing in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: NRTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: AVOID AT ALL COSTS!
customer_reviews.text: 50% of the strips didn't work. Errors. Fresh out the box. All but carried on a silver tray with tweezers. Of those that worked, 2 taken 4 minutes apart, had a variance of 58 points! Two days prior, there was a variance of almost 150 points! Either the test is absolute garbage or I'm a vampire and haven't figured it out yet. They even want you to use one strip to QA. Because they clearly can't do that. I would say this product is worthless, but I had to stab myself multiple times and stress about the ridiculous results. It is far worse than worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously inaccurate!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after some recent blood work had me a little curious and concerned. This meter was extremely easy to use and to read. Unfortunately, it is not accurate in the least! After using it for 2 weeks I got suspicious and bought a different meter. Comparing them side by side at the same time, this one was off by so much, it could have gotten me killed if I had sought treatment! I used a meter at work (I work in a medical office) to see which one was more accurate. Turns out the Bayer was spot on and this one was off by 30-55 points on fasting blood! This monitor is dangerously inaccurate!
customer_reviews.author: G.L.C.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these test strips to monitor my blood sugar during my pregnancy. It has been fantastic and super easy to use. I am already over pricking my fingers so I feel for all of you that don't get a break at the end of a pregnancy. The monitor is very intuitive and works just like the booklet says. It's very fail safe and I've yet to have to retest due to a bad reading.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD PRODUCT FOR THE FIRST TIME USER
customer_reviews.text: For a first time user, this is a good product. After reading the instructions that were clearly detailed, and trying it, I was surprised at the ease in using it. I don't have diabetes, but needed to answer a question about my blood sugars. The cost of this product was well worth it, it saved a trip to the doctors office, probably a 10 fold charge for the visit, yielding the same answer. After the first try, I now feel like a pro in using it. Not sure how accurate it is, but am assuming it is in the ballpark of acceptable performance.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate but still has value
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this kit three times, 2 times for other people. I think it's an inexpensive way to get people in the habit of testing. I tested myself four times in a row and the results were up to 30 points apart. I hope they fix this. The company seems to really care and I hope they iron this out.
customer_reviews.author: Scully

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit because though I have never been officially diagnosed with anything I know I'm at high risk for diabetes and I also often have symptoms of low blood sugar. It was perfect for what I was looking for. Just something cheap that will get the job done. Though I can't say if it "feels cheap" compared to others because this is the only one I've used, in general I don't think it feels cheap. I loved that it gave me EVERYTHING I needed to get started and if I needed more strips they're easy to find on Amazon as well. It's very easy to set up, use, and read!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Device
customer_reviews.text: Three times after checking my blood sugar with this device, I compared the results with the results of the hospital, they were closed to each other, not exactly the same, but quite close with 2 to 3 digits more or less. Unlike other devices I used in the past, this one is more accurate. On the other hand, I’m using an app called Glucose along with this device that calculates the A1C.
customer_reviews.author: Az Baragabah

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This meter gets close to the right reading but can easily vary by 10 points or more while sampling the same finger at the same time. Because the readings varied so much, I ordered more of the expensive name brand strips for my old meter and used it to compare; the old meter gave repeated readings within two points (112/114) while this one varied from 107 to 120. The case is nice, the lancet is so-so but the readings really shouldn't be trusted if you're using it to measure for meds. The price is great and the strips are cheap but the safety with meds is doubtful.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Complete newbie here. I had not done a stick on myself before and was terrified. I honestly barely felt this. I set the lancet at three and had to adjust my way up to five. The meter read it with a very small amount and seemed very accurate. I did use the test solution on a strip and it read at 123 and the solution was for 125. I’m super happy with it! I will say I don’t use it for daily testing, only when I start to drop with my hypoglycemia.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Quality testing kit at an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with everything about this kit! Accurate easy to use and easy to read meter and lancing device, detailed instructions, log book and a sippered case to put it all in! Not a ton of test strips or lancets, but can reorder more and they are reasonably priced. Having had a Freestyle before this, I have found no difference in quality. Unbeatable deal, highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: great price!!! fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: seems very accurate,easy to use,cheapest strip price i can find anywhere,love it.
customer_reviews.author: david raines

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to be proactive on watching my sugar in my senior years so tried this monitor after seeing nice reviews. Well - this is excellent quality at a great reasonable price. So easy to use. Thank you for a great product at affordable prices.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Van Wickle

customer_reviews.title: What a value!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a diabetic but have been told I was in the pre-diabetic stage with a recommendation to monitor my glucose while fasting for two weeks prior to my next visit. The value of the cost of the strips for a person like me who does not need to read three to five times a day is one of the primary reasons I purchased this product and am very satisfied. An even greater benefit is the 4 microliter drop of blood required and the three second read time. All of this from an economical and easy to use machine. Great job On Call!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Skid

customer_reviews.title: Affordable good quality blood sugar monitor
customer_reviews.text: This product has exceeded my expectations so far. After using other glucose monitors this is number one. The ease of use is a plus. Have to give it time to see if it holds up in terms of its accuracy and reliability. The price is an incentive to buy. Glucose strips are also reasonably priced, Thank goodness! Pleased with the overall performance so far. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: menen

product_meta.title: On Call Express Diabetes Testing Kit- Blood Glucose Meter, 10 Blood Test Strips, 1 Lancing Device, 30g Lancets, Control Solution, Carrying Case, Log Book, Black
feature_bullets: Fda Cleared: reliable, clinically proven Accuracy
Fast 4 second testing with a tiny 0.4 microliter sample size
Stores 300 tests with meal markers, hypo/hyper alarms, ketone test alert and 5 daily testing reminders
Audible fill detection and test strip release ejector
